P104357.project_name: Yogyakarta and Central Java Earthquake Roof Structure Project

keywords.cdata: Accounting, ADB, Architecture, Auditing, auditors, audits, bricks, building manuals, building materials, cement, Civil Engineering, communities, community groups, concrete, construction, construction manager, construction materials, construction workers, COOPERATIVE HOUSING, DISBURSEMENT, districts, doors, emergency shelter, employment, Environmental, environmental impacts, environmental issues, Environmental problems, Exchange Rate, expenditures, Financial Management, financial statement, financial statements, financial transaction, health problems, homes, households, houses, HOUSING, Indigenous Peoples, internal controls, inventories, inventory, local government, Masonry, neighborhoods, operational risks, Pacific Region, Quality Control, resettlement, Risk Management, roofing, roofs, Safety, sand, self-help, settlement, structural elements, structures, technical assistance, tents, tile, tiles, timber, Urban Development, villages, walls, water supply, windows

project_abstract.cdata: The objective of the Yogyakarta and Central Java Earthquake Roof Structure Project is to respond to the most basic needs of the households affected by the earthquake through the provision of roof structures that transition to permanent housing. The Project will provide eligible families in targeted villages in the affected areas with safe and durable housing through the provision of roof structures while permanent house is being rebuilt. The Project provides the eligible beneficiaries an 18 m2 of roof-structure house constructed with bamboo columns and roof trusses and bamboo sheets for the walls with clay roof tiles. Most of the materials of the roof structures can be reused in building a permanent house. The program has five components: (i) set-up of the prefabrication facility, (ii) preparation of Roof Structure Kits, (iii) targeting and distribution of kits to beneficiaries, (iv) assistance to beneficiaries during construction, and (v) quality control and reporting.
